sentence.value: James "Larry" DeLucas (O. D., Ph.D.) is an American biochemist who flew aboard NASA Space Shuttle mission STS-50 as a Payload Specialist.

sentence.value: DeLucas attended the University of Alabama at Birmingham (UAB), in Birmingham, Alabama and received the following degrees: DeLucas is a member of the following organizations: He has published over 125 research articles in refereed scientific journals, is co-author of 2 books, and co-inventor on 25 patents.

sentence.value: Over a two-week period, the crew conducted a wide variety of experiments relating to materials processing and fluid physics.

sentence.value: At mission conclusion, DeLucas had traveled over 5.7 million miles in 221 Earth orbits, and had logged over 331 hours in space.

sentence.pattern_crowdsource: At mission conclusion, DeLucas had traveled over 5.7 million miles in 221 Earth orbits, and had logged over 331 hours in space.
